name: Empyrean
description: A gargantuan celestial being that epitomizes divine strength with exceptional physical capabilities and a suite of powerful spells.
memorable: Its ability to negate damage and diverse spellcasting make it a formidable celestial adversary.
goals: To serve as a potent force in combat and protect its allies.
relations: May be related to other celestial beings or serve deities.
environment: Open skies and celestial realms, often involved in divine battles.
strengths: Immunities to radiant damage and nonmagical weapons; high Strength and Constitution scores.
weaknesses: Can be overwhelmed by coordinated assaults due to notable weaknesses in Dexterity.
attacks: Delivers powerful melee strikes with a maul, dealing bludgeoning and radiant damage, alongside potent spell attacks like lightning bolt and flame strike.
most_powerful_ability: Divine Grace allows it to negate damage from certain effects and enhance its defensive capabilities.
senses: Possesses truesight out to 120 feet, allowing it to see through darkness.
additional_information: Can change size between Gargantuan and Medium using Immortal Form.
Legendary actions include making attacks and casting spells after other creatures' turns.
Innate spellcasting ability based on Charisma with a high spell save DC of 23.
Can paralyze foes with Hold Monster and control the battlefield effectively.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting ability with powerful spells like flame strike and hold monster, allowing versatility in and out of combat.
test_queries: divine being that can change size
celestial creature immune to radiant damage
Empyrean tactics in battle and spells
